name: Netherhot Forge
pages: The Netherhot forge is 25x more faster than the vanilla furnace, with 2 additional smelting slots, below is the recipe for it. This forge can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/netherhot_furnace)netherhot furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires 3 $(l:patchouli:items/netherhot_conductor_block)netherhot conductor blocks/$ in its recipe.
